channel.title: atmosphere on Dominic Royé
channel.description: Recent content in atmosphere on Dominic Royé

item.title: Climate and Weather
item.description: Probability of a summer day (maximum temperature greater than 25ºC) through the year in Australia. Data: SILO. Probability of a frost day (minimum temperature less than 0ºC) through the year in Europe. Data: E-OBS 18e. Probability of a frost day (minimum temperature less than 0ºC/32ºF) through the year in the Contiguous United States. Data: PRISM. Platform: Google Earth Engine. Concentration of daily precipitation in the contiguous United States 1981-2017.
